trans-unit.source: A token handler for encrypted security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 된 보안 토큰에 대 한 토큰 처리기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 토큰 처리 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A token handler that serializes and deserializes <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken> objects from `<xenc:EncryptedData>` elements and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> objects from `<xenc:EncryptedKey>` elements as defined in the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210).
trans-unit.target: 직렬화 및 역직렬화 하는 토큰 처리기 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken>에서 개체를 `<xenc:EncryptedData>` 요소 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause>에서 개체를 `<xenc:EncryptedKey>` XML 암호화 구문 및 처리 (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210) 사양에 정의 된 대로 요소.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current XML element is pointing to an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedKey>" name="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element that can be deserialized to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 XML 요소를 가리키고 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedKey>" name="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> 를 deserialize 할 수 있는 요소는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> 이 인스턴스에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element.
trans-unit.target: 시작 요소에 배치 하는 XML 판독기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The reader should not be advanced.
trans-unit.target: 판독기를 이동할 수 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the XML reader is positioned at an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedKey>" name="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element as defined in section 3.5.1 of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>XML 판독기에 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedKey>" name="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> 3.5.1 사양의 섹션 XML 암호화 구문 및 처리 (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210;)에 정의 된 요소, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the reader is pointing to an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 판독기가 가리키는 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Does not move the reader when it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 될 때 판독기를 이동 하지 않습니다 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The reader positioned at a security token (<xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""></xref> element.)
trans-unit.target: 보안 토큰에 배치 하는 판독기 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""> </xref> 요소입니다.)

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader is positioned at an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""></xref> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>판독기에 하는 경우는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""> </xref> 요소, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the handler provides serialization functionality for tokens.
trans-unit.target: 처리기 토큰에 대 한 serialization 기능을 제공 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handler can serialize tokens; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>처리기; 토큰을 serialize 할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type identifier URIs for tokens handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에 의해 처리 된 토큰에 대 한 형식 식별자를 Uri를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, returns an array with a single <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> string because there is not a specific token type identifier that is associated with the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 단일의 배열을 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 연관 된 특정 토큰 유형이 식별자 없기 때문에 문자열은 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"> </xref> 유형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that will be used to serialize and deserialize key identifiers from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> 를 serialize 및 deserialize 된 키 식별자가 사용할는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedData>" name="<xenc:EncryptedData>" href=""> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer that will be used to read and write key the key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 읽기 및 쓰기 키의 키 식별자에 사용할 수 있는 토큰 serializer입니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 속성을 설정 하려고 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Reads an <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> from an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: 읽고 있는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> XML 스트림에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedKey>" name="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element as defined in 'http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210'; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 판독기에 한 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<xenc:EncryptedKey>" name="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> 고, 그렇지 않으면 'http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210'에 정의 된 요소 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A key identifier clause of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 키 식별자 절 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: reader is not positioned at an element.
trans-unit.target: reader위치에 없습니다는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Reads an encrypted security token.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 된 보안 토큰을 읽습니다.

trans-unit.source: The reader from which to read the token.
trans-unit.target: 토큰을 읽을 판독기입니다.

trans-unit.source: A security token of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 보안 토큰 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: There is no configured service token resolver.
trans-unit.target: 구성 된 서비스 토큰 해결 프로그램이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: (Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.ServiceTokenResolver%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the referenced token handler configuration is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: (중 하나는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성 또는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.ServiceTokenResolver%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 참조 된 토큰 처리기 구성의 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A service token resolver is required to obtain keys for decryption.
trans-unit.target: 암호 해독을 위해 키를 가져올 서비스 토큰 확인 자가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection"></xref>Referenced through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection*> property is unable to find a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> that can read the decrypted XML and return a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -또는- <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection"> </xref>를 통해 참조 되는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection*>속성은 찾을 수 없습니다는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> 암호 해독 된 XML을 읽을 하 고 반환할 수 있는 한 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> is not found inside the XML pointed to by the reader.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref> 판독기가 XML 가리키는 내부가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> is not a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -or- The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> is not a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> found inside the XML cannot be resolved by the configured service token resolver to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref> XML 구성 된 서비스 토큰 확인자를 해결할 수 없는 내부 발견 한 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the token handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에 의해 처리 된 토큰의 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The token type handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에 의해 처리 된 토큰 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref><xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_typeof" name="typeof" href=""></xref><xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes an encrypted security token using the XML writer.
trans-unit.target: XML 작성기를 사용 하는 암호화 된 보안 토큰을 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML writer to which to write the encrypted token.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 된 토큰을 쓸 XML 작성기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The encrypted security token, must be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 된 보안 토큰의 인스턴스 여야 합니다. <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- token is .
trans-unit.target: -or- token is .

trans-unit.source: token is not assignable as .
trans-unit.target: token으로 할당할 수 없으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is required for obtaining keys for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 암호화를 위한 키를 얻기 위해 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The token handler collection returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection*> property was unable to find a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> that can write the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -또는-토큰 처리기 컬렉션에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection*>속성을 찾을 수 없습니다.는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> 작성할 수 있는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> 에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials.SecurityKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not assignable as <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials.SecurityKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성으로 할당할 수 없는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey"> </xref>합니다.
